pages.text: This device is used to craft a plethora of things in Create. From cooking things using blazing heat to brewing potions in batches, this is the machine of choice for the aspiring engineer.
Be sure to use a hair tie and throw your tie back before operating!
This Mixer is also capable of crafting any shapeless recipe, just feed it the items needed. Why don't you hover over the Mixer and hold 'W'?
As an example, you could toss in 16 Gunpowder, 16 Coal and 16 Blaze Powder and it would make 48 Fire Charges.
